LanguageData.AEXP_Camel.label: camel
LanguageData.AEXP_Camel.description: A large land mammal adapted to arid environments. Domesticated since ancient times, its wool and leather are both exceptionally good at insulating against the desert heat, and its milk is quite nourishing. It can be used as a pack animal, but two humps make it extremely uncomfortable to ride.\n\nBy storing water in its large humps and reclaiming moisture from its breath as it exhales, it can go weeks without drinking.
LanguageData.AEXP_Camel_Leather.label: camel leather
LanguageData.AEXP_Camel_Corpse.label: camel corpse
LanguageData.AEXP_Rattlesnake.label: rattlesnake
LanguageData.AEXP_Rattlesnake.description: A highly venomous snake, recieving it's name from a rattle at the end of their tail. The sound generated sounds as a warning to any predators, however in case it doesn't work, rattlesnake's venom-fangs inflict extremely painful toxin.
LanguageData.AEXP_Rattlesnake_Leather.label: rattlesnake leather
LanguageData.AEXP_Rattlesnake_Corpse.label: rattlesnake corpse
LanguageData.AEXP_Megascorpion.label: megascorpion
LanguageData.AEXP_Megascorpion.description: A giant, genetically-engineered scorpion. Once created as a perfect assassination tool, it is not often seen returning to it's natural habitat - desert. A very potent poison in it's stinger helps it in tacking even much bigger prey. A eusocial creature, it cannot reproduce individually.
LanguageData.AEXP_Megascorpion_Corpse.label: megascorpion corpse
